name: Create new Endorsal contacts from new MailChimp subscribers
description:
This template periodically checks for new subscribers in MailChimp and uploads them as new contacts into Endorsal.

The template expects your MailChimp audience to have a phone number field which is a mandatory field in Endorsal. If you don't have phone numbers in MailChimp, you will need to at least upload dummy phone number values.

The template is scheduled to run daily at 8:00 am. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
